Pt41qc1amAUoR8SdgEbHzQnNTRK2.buzzer_string: This man was inspired by the work of Toru Takemitsu while staying in Japan. He conducted the premiere of Takemitsu's Dorian Horizon. This man formed a friendship with Carlos Chávez to whom his second symphony The Short Symphony is dedicated. This man also composed the opera The Tender Land and later on composed the orchestral work Connotations. This composer's third and final symphony was premiered by Serge Koussevitzky, and it's final movement forms the basis of his Fanfare: For the Common Man. For ten points, name this American Composer known
Pt41qc1amAUoR8SdgEbHzQnNTRK2.most_important_sentence: For ten points, name this American Composer known
